text: ...my head...
... where am I ???
... he's stabilized for now.
Keep him in the ICU untill ...
Normal ecg, bp, and hr...
PERFECT!
Who are all these people?
... I'm in a hospital???
What happened???
Nurse!
Nurse!!!
So tired ...
I better head back to my bed.
I must have had some sort of accident.
I can`t remember a thing.
I need to find a nurse to tell me what's going on...
Excuse me nurse.
and who do we have here...
Mystery Man?!
YOU'RE AWAKE!!!
[The blood suddenly drains from your head...]
... but he was doing so well,
walking around smiling.
Impossible! Not in that condition.
Are you sure you didn't imagine it?
OF COURSE I DIDN'T IMAGINE IT!!!
Ok, ok! I'm sorry!
Well there's not much I can do. We don't even know his name.
With a tumor that size he's got a year tops.
Besides it's lunch break and they're cooking my favorite...
PEPERONI PIZZA!
[The doctor leaves in a hurry]
Why does he get so excited about pepperoni pizza!?
I think things you cannot.
You will be me.
A brain tumor?
A year to live!!!
I must have dreamt it. My dreams have been extremely vivid lately.
That nurse should be able to clear things up...
Is it true nurse, do I have a brain tumor?
Mystery Man?!
DON'T SNEAK UP ON ME LIKE THAT!!!
Please forgive me for shouting.
Unfortunately it's true.
And only a year to live?
I'm sorry.
The tumor has spread throughout your brain and is inoperable.
Do you have any friends and family I can contact for you?
[Wait a minute who even am I?]
I don't even know my own name
Oh my!
Well no matter, we'll be your new family!
We're not the biggest hospital but that just makes everything more cosey!
We have a beautiful garden and a cute little cat and ...
Nurse! Nurse! Can I go play now?
Oh, it looks like little Havier wants to play football again.
Well Man of Mystery you get back to bed now and get some rest!
This place again?!
I don't like it here.
I need to find a way out!
What just happened?
It felt so real.
It WAS real! I was inside my body just now.
Could it be the brain tumor ...
[The curtain draws open as a bubbly middle age woman appears in front of your bed]
Guess who's got your favorite treats...
Oh my, I'm sorry. I must have got the wrong bed.
I would give you a sweetie to make up for it but these are all for my son Havier.
He loves them so much he'd hate it if I gave any away hehe!
[The woman opens the curtain to the bed across from you]
Guess who's got your favorite treats!
But I'm not hungry!
Nonsense! Look at you, your skin and bones
I can't have all the lovely doctors and nurses thinking I don't take care of my boy.
Now come on, eat up!
ok
So how are you feeling Mr ... erm ... well what is your name? Let me see, it appears the nurse has wrote Mystery. So Mr Mystery how are we feeling today?
I feel like I was in my body just now. Maybe my brain. And I was fighting pathogens with my immune cells.
It was so real.
Have any patients managed to beat brain tumors by going into their bodies so to speak?
Oh dear, he's declining more rapidly than I thought (he mumbles to himself)
It's not possible to go into your body and fight pathogens, whatever that means.
It's best you just accept your condition as it is
Sure some people do get better from it but nobody knows how or why
You should try to just enjoy the pleasures of life, like candy!
[The doctor walks to the boys bed across and reaches for some candy.]
Get your hands off!
[She slaps the doctors hand]
These are for my son and my son only!
It's fine you can have them. I'm full.
What have I told you Havier? These are for you and for you only.
No football until you finish them!
And you doctor. I would expect better than trying to take candy from a child!
I'm sorry Miss, they just looked so delicious.
Anyway, you're looking well Havier!
You know we just might be ready to let you home by the end of tomorrow!
Oh boy really?!
Yes really!
Just don't forget how your favorite doctor patched you up when you become a famous soccer star, ha ha!
You wake to a large commotion across from you, nurses and doctors running in and out
[You see that one nurse you recognise from before]
Nurse! What's going on?
Poor Havier has fallen ill again, we don't know why
Please excuse me.
My poor boy! Why do bad things always happen to me!?
There there. It's going to be ok.
The doctors are working as hard as the can
He's stabilizing.
Thank god!
What did we miss!
Nurse! Stay at his bedside for the rest of your shift.
He needs close monitoring
Contact me if there is the slightest change in his condition!
Is he going to be alright?
For now.
[The doctors and nurses keep buzzing around the boys bed for the rest of the day]
[You wake up to see Havier sleeping or possibly unconcious with his mum dutifully beside him also asleep.]
I should find out whats going on with him
I don't want to disturb his resting mum.
I should go find that nurse
Excuse me nurse.
Oh, Mr Mystery!
Just give me a second while I see to Sofias feeding tube.
Poor Sofia. Shes been in a coma for over 10 years now.
She got in some kind of accident when she was 20
Her family barely visit anymore
I think they moved away. I guess it was all too depressing for them
I like to talk her about my day.
I think she can hear me you know.
Were all the family she has left...
All done!
So what can I do for you?
I was just wondering what was happening with the boy across from me.
Hes ok for now. Though it was a close one.
He was doing so well...
It's happened before too. I just hope the doctors can figure out whats going on.
Anyway, your looking a little unsteady. I think you should go back to bed for now.
[The next few days you spend mostly sleeping. Havier still hasn't woken.]
I need to get up and move around!
[You find yourself sitting next to Sofias bed]
It's so sad. Are you trapped in there or are you just sleeping?
You reach out to grab her hand.
Suddenly a spark jolts through your brain!
It's happening again!
Who's that? Sofia!?
Wait. It can't be!?
Another person???
You're Sofia? You can hear me?
You're actually alive in here?
How do you know my name?
Are you just a figment of my imagination???
No time to explain. Enemies approach!
Was that real?!
I need to get back to Sofia! I have to help her escape!
